title: How does one explain the mummy nicknamed Ginger, and the other mummies with fair hair, of pre-dynastic ancient Egypt? - Quora

response.answer_text: How does one explain the mummy nicknamed Ginger, and the other mummies with fair hair, of pre-dynastic ancient Egypt? Blonde hair is not a natural feature only to Caucasians of Nordic descent. The people of Melanesia are Blacks with NATURALLY blonde hair. Not dyes which probably the mummies above used (before they died).
